thread.title: Chipmaker Diodes to buy Pericom for $400 million
thread.title_full: Chipmaker Diodes to buy Pericom for $400 million

title: Chipmaker Diodes to buy Pericom for $400 million
text:
Related: Tech, Deals Chipmaker Diodes to buy Pericom for $400 million 
Chipmaker Diodes Inc ( DIOD.O ) said it would buy Pericom Semiconductor Corp ( PSEM.O ) in a deal valued at about $400 million to boost its analog and mixed-signal chip businesses. 
Diodes' offer of $17 per share in cash represents a premium of 39.6 percent to Pericom's Wednesday close.
